My free time is spent being distracted from watching airplanes by an episode of The Simpsons.

  • Aviation

    Licensed pilot flying dinky airplanes


    I will stand next to a runway for hours and watch airplanes without a care in the world.

  • Illustration & Design

    Greeting cards, apps, websites, and more!


    Open-ended design projects best tackled with pencil and paper.

  • Simpsons Trivia

    WOO HOO!: Classic Simpsons Trivia (Toronto)


    I've been known to enjoy a Simpsons reference from time to time.

  • Hardware Tinkering

    Mechanical & electrical projects


    I will assuredly enjoy any physics-based project with real-world applications.

  • Hiking

    In Vancouver, BC


    I do a couple light hikes every week, and in the summer typically a more intensive hike every week or two. My all-time favourite hike is The Chief, in Squamish.
